I suspect that this defect is a dupe of 73614.  I'd like Javier to confirm 
that this problem goes away when working around 73614 by calling the execution 
harness synchronously.  If so, I'll dupe this to 73614.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 73614 ***
